text.text_translated:
The rover checks the air around it.  
In 2014 it found methane in the air.  
Methane is a small natural gas.  
Methane only lasts a few hundred years.  
Something on Mars is making more methane.  
NASA says Mars makes thousands of tons of methane.  
The amount of methane goes up and down each season.  
It is like the planet breathes.
